metadata.synopsis: The player attempts to interact with the door communicator in the Captain's Office after having talked to the inquisitor. Demonstrating no more interactivity with device.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Approach the door communicator at 1354; 1; -764 and interact with it. Once the Templar opens it for you, interact with it again, to trigger the Voicebark.

0.speaker: Player
0.text: Looks like the barrier's turned off. Lucky me.
